title: Bristol Herald Courier carrier dead, four injured in overnight shootings in Bristol
content:
Members of the Bristol Tennessee Police Department and the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives were on scene. Several residents said police arrived early Thursday and spent several hours into the afternoon at the property, which is located at the corner of Fifth Street and Melrose Avenue.
